text: A Kiss from Mary Pickford () is a 1927 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Sergei Komarov.В аргентинской столице открылась Неделя российского кино It stars Igor Ilyinsky, Anel Sudakevich, and Abram Room. ==Actors== * Igor Ilyinsky as Goga Palkin * Anel Sudakevich as Dusya Galkina * Abram Room * Mary Pickford as herself (cameo) * Douglas Fairbanks as himself (cameo) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1927 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Komarov
title: A Kiss from Mary Pickford
